borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
The proposed development, by reason of scale and siting, would result in detrimental harm to the neighbouring property. Specifically, it would cause unacceptable an overbearing impact on 29 Raydons Road's garden, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:

- National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023);

- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);

- Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);

- Policy BP8 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);

- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021); and

- The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (February 2012).

The proposed development, by reason of scale, siting and design, would result in unacceptable harm to the appearance of the original dwelling and disruption of the semi-detached pair's symmetry, and an increasing sense of closure at this prominent location, which would cause detrimental impact on the street scene and local character, especially given the context of the Becontree Estate. Therefore, the proposed development is contrary to:

- National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023);

- Policies D1, D4 & HC1 of the London Plan (March 2021);

- Policies CP2 & CP3 the LBBD's Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);

- Policies BP2 & BP11 of the LBBD's Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);

- Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 & DMD6 of the LBBD’s Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021); and

- The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).
description: Construction of a single storey front extension and front porch and the construction of a part two storey part single storey side extension
